short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily monitor GD Colon's progress on his new videos without having to open his website for that.
short.pl: Łatwo monitoruj postępy GD Colona w tworzeniu nowych filmów, bez konieczności otwierania jego strony internetowej.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was made mainly to save time, I was NOT hired or asked by GD Colon to do this extension.
long.pl:
Monitor the live progress of GD Colon's next upload.

This extension was made mainly to save time, I was NOT hired or asked by GD Colon to do this extension (I wasn't forced to say this, not at all :D).
